title: Akka 007
author: Akka 007
created_time: February 23, 2023, 06:21:04 PMLast edit: October 02, 2023, 06:28:08 AM by Akka 007
content: Paprikacoin NetworkPaprikacoin is a cryptocurrency bringing its entry into the mining world. By introducing a different way to "mine". With no premine and a different type of block structure.Paprikacoin Blockchain is highly scalable, built with the ability to process thousands of transactions per second, it is faster than most L1 blockchains.Coins Specifications249,000,000 total supplyHalving :4 years estimatedAlgorithm: KawPOWProof of WorkAssets CreationImportant links:Website: https://landing.paprikacoin.orgExplorer: https://explorer.paprikacoin.orgWhite paper: https://landing.paprikacoin.org/wp/whitepaper-en.pdfPools Availablehttps://miningpoolstats.stream/paprikacoinDownload Links:Windows wallet: https://github.com/paprika-network/paprikacoin/releasesLinux Wallet: https://github.com/paprika-network/paprikacoin/releasesSocial:Twitter: https://twitter.com/paprikaexDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/jgrXwraV65Exchanges:Tradeorge: https://tradeogre.com/exchange/PAPRY-USDTXeggex: https://xeggex.com/market/PAPRY_USDTNoKYC: https://nonkyc.io/market/PAPRY_LTCOther Links:Whattomine: https://whattomine.com/coins/374-papry-kawpowHashrate.no: https://hashrate.no/coins/PAPRYDelta.app: https://delta.app/en/crypto-trackerPaprikacoin use cases:Paprika Blockchain supports asset creation which means you can create token on paprika chain or mint NFTs. Well in the future we have planned for an app where users can use Paprikacoin for buying gift cards for all various reputable websites like Amazon, Uber, Google Play etc.Papry is now available on https://cryptocurrencycheckout.com/coin/paprikacoin which means that you can buy goods online on different website using our coin.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Paprika (PAPRY) to http://zpool.ca/algo/kawpow. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine kawpow and get paid in PAPRY:Code:-a kawpow -o stratum+tcp://kawpow.mine.zpool.ca:1325 -u PAPRY_ADDRESS -p c=PAPRY Exchange to BTC:Code:-a kawpow -o stratum+tcp://kawpow.mine.zpool.ca:1325 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for kawpow: 51325==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: shell32
comments.body: 1. Initially, there were no instructions in staking that it was impossible to mine on the staking wallet. And about the minimum deposit was not originally written. Later they added these conditions and banned me.2. We do not have a seed phrase for the staking wallet, which means that the money in someone else's wallet does not belong to us.This means that you can ban any person and take his coins. Well well well... This is not how the community thinks about decentralization.
